amendment.description: Amendment requires the Civil Liberties Protection Officer to ensure that the coordination and training between the intelligence community and local law enforcement agencies does not violate the constitutional safeguards of racial and ethnic minorities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-504 to require the Civil Liberties Protection Officer to ensure that the coordination and training between the intelligence community and local law enforcement agencies shall not violate the constitutional safeguards of racial and ethnic minorities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
